title: Another rank dodge that isn't my fault
body: So when I get to the character banning screen and select a champion I wanna ban every 1 out of 5 games the game says invalid champion choice when I click the portrait and its selected and click the ban button another screen pops up and says invalid champion selection. Never had this problem until about a few weeks ago but now I'm 30min ban and lost a bunch of LP because of the problem.

replies.body:
I've had this issue also. And so has my friend, name tag Delemord.

We even had a match that disconnected all players yesterday and did not go on match history. We are not all in the same state, so connection could not have been the issue.

Ooooo this is actually not an issue I've seen very often. Typically, if you can't lock in your champion it would point towards some kind of weird connection issue, so let's start there and see if we can narrow down the main problem. Make sure to go through each step in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but definitely hit me back up if that doesn't smooth things out!
